column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We had the cauliflower and crispy chicken for appetizers (both delicious
column2: but the crispy chicken won hands down). I then got the premium tonkotsu white
column3: which has pork and chicken broth. Amazing. The broth itself was great
column6: it was delicious. The pork melted in my mouth. The service was very good. I can't wait to go back!
